detail_desc: Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.

Mesh shopper with imitation leather details, and two handles and a zip at the top. Unlined. Size 17x34x36 cm.
Metal watch with a narrow, adjustable strap in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 1.4 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.8 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with embroidered appliqués and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Rain jacket with sealed seams, fastenings down the front, a detachable hood and long raglan sleeves. Jersey lining.
Imitation leather sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal fastener and concealed elastication. Rubber soles with a fluted underside.
Short top in sequined velour with long sleeves. Jersey lining.
Suit trousers in a woven linen blend with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Pockets in the side seams, fake welt pockets at the back and straight-cut legs with creases.
